name: capturesdk-cordova-examples
description: Socket Mobile Capture SDK Cordova Plugin Examples

scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint src && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint tests
scripts.build: yarn createcordova && yarn addandroid && yarn addios && yarn addcapturesdk && yarn addinappbrowser && yarn copy
scripts.buildfromclone: yarn createcordova && yarn addandroid && yarn addios && yarn addcapturesdkfromclone && yarn addinappbrowser && yarn copy
scripts.addandroid: cd inappbrowser && cordova platform add android@6.4
scripts.addios: cd inappbrowser && cordova platform add ios
scripts.adddeviceplugin: cd inappbrowser && cordova plugins add cordova-plugin-device
scripts.addinappbrowser: cd inappbrowser && cordova plugins add cordova-plugin-inappbrowser

author: Chris Van Emmerik
